Do you buy or sell stock based on consensus forecasts? Analyst Juli Niemann at Smith, Moore & Company says there is something you should know about that strategy. She joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to explain.

"}]
description: Do you buy or sell stocks based on consensus forecasts? Analyst Juli Niemann at Smith, Moore & Company says there is something you should know about that strategy.
title: Breaking away from the consensus
teaser: Do you buy or sell stocks based on consensus forecasts? Analyst Juli Niemann at Smith, Moore & Company says there is something you should know about that strategy.
